title: 실리콘밸리 슈퍼스타트업 한국 오피스 Cloud Infrastructure (DevOps) Engineer
content:
주요 업무
        Build and deploy automated software deployment pipelines, infrastructure-as-code, config management and monitoring toolsMaintain and Improve our Continuous Integration / Continuous Deployment Infrastructure stackAutomate infrastructure and configuration managementMonitor server resources

업무 관련 기술 / 활동 분야
        
          devops
          devops engineer
          infrastructure
          Amazon AWS
          Python
          Java
          INFRA

채용 상세
        자격요건- DevOps experience or similar software engineering role- Strong scripting and (e.g. Python) and automation skills- Experience of working in AWS Cloud infra- Experience with system monitoring tools- Knowledge of Container- Familiar with SQL and NoSQL우대사항- Experience with logging systems- Experience with multi-region deployment- Experience handling massive concurrent connections and processing large-scale traffic- Understanding of Unix/Linux systems- Understanding of Python, Java, and Event-Driven Frameworks- Understanding of TCP/IP and network programming- Understanding of RDBMS, NoSQL and distributed databases- Understanding of server virtualization, global infrastructures, load balancing, and handling massive data traffic
